column3: Open Feline Aerodynamics Review journal (available on your dashboard)
In text area add flag's note (any text)
Save application, Unlock & Close the form

column4: At the top navbar Notifications indicate a new notification
Feline Aerodynamics Review journal form is opened in a new tab
On the right the flag is displayed and assigned to you ("ProfessorQuibbleton")

column3: Unlock & Close the form, close the tab
Click the Notifications button at the top navigation bar

column4: At the top of the list "New flag" notification is displayed.
The long description says "A new flag in 'Feline Aerodynamics Review' (id) has been assigned to you"

column3: Open the testdrive/flags page do not close the page where you are logged in
Click "Run background task" button, wait for the task to execute
Go back to the tab where you are logged as ProfessorQuibbleton
navigate to /dashboard/notifications if not already there

column4: At the top of the notifications list a new notification "Deadline reminder" is listed
Long description says "The deadline for the flag in 'Feline Aerodynamics Review' (id) is in 7 days."
At the top navbar Notifications button has a new notification marked

column3: Click "See action" link at the right of the new "Deadline reminder" notification

column4: Feline Aerodynamics Review journal form is opened in a new tab

column3: Unlock & Close the form, close the tab
